extendedInfo.description: Funny Mouth is real time mouths simulation application with your voice. Select any of the mouths and they will move in animate with your voice as you speak.Free 17 mouths, will fill you with lot of laughs. Get Funny Mouth on your Android handset and express yourself in different way. Hold your phone in front of your mouth and talk, shout, laugh or sing to get the mouth of your choice to animate in time with the sounds you make. You can enjoy funny mouth in party by making fun of other using this application.Following issues has been resolved in the current build:1. Solved crash and freeze issues on some devices.2. Improve performance.Add new category of realistic mouths. Please provide details of when you encountered any crash while using this app.This app is supported via search. Please note that the following will be added to your device once you download the app â Search icon, bookmark link and browser homepage. You can delete/replace these search points easily. This is a way to make money from this app and giving it to you for free. Thank you for your understanding.

reviews.title: Okay...
reviews.comment: This app is okay... but I recommend \'Blabber Mouths + Voice Changer\' it\'s smooth and you can record yourself in different voices!
reviews.author: Nicole Brusch

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Work!!!
reviews.comment: It won\'t calibrate,  and when I try to talk, the mouth won\'t work!!! This makes me sad :-( and angary!!! >:-0 Ahhhh!!! Gurrrr! I\'m so frustrated!!!
reviews.author: Ken Chumbley

reviews.title: Why so many ads?
reviews.comment: This app is loaded with ads!! In order to even use it, the developers makes you to agree to change your internet search provider, and home page on your cell, along with adding icons to your home screen. This doesn\'t count the ads that are actually in the beginning, and in the bottom of the mouth animation. The only reason I gave even two stars, is because the mouth movements can be smooth. I do notice it picks up anyone who is talking voice though.
reviews.author: Sharon Smith

reviews.title: Nope.try then u will unistall it.
reviews.comment: Sucks sucks sucks.but it  was funny putting up to my dogs face his bark made it move. Lol.try your animal and just talk lol.dumb....sucks sucks sucks.
reviews.author: Martin Schmit

reviews.title: Could be a five
reviews.comment: This could be a 5 stars. And navigation in this thing what is so freaking terrible. Either Insur auctions in the menu to go back and change the mouth or when somebody prices the back button on your phone send to a man you\'re 1 of your retarded advertisements instead of forcing in exit. This is a very basic concept an idea but I\'m sure you get on to it eventually. I basically 2 stars, 1 reason it\'s free and second reason it\'s really easy it is just annoying.
reviews.author: Edwin Monzon

reviews.title: Uhhhh
reviews.comment: It\'s a nice app i like how it can move it\'s mouth when you speak.,But if you say something like la or a word that starts with l and it says a word like ma with it\'s mouth or a word or movement it starts with m instead of l I think you should fix that plz.

reviews.title: Not satisfactory..
reviews.comment: But can enjoy and have some fun though..needs a try for sure ^.^

reviews.title: Wayyyyyyy to many ads!
reviews.comment: Offer a paid app! The constant ads make this app crash and make the app unusable... UPDATE; with new update now putting spam search engine on my phone. REMOVING! DO NOT DOWNLOAD. I AM ALERTING GOOGLE ON UNWANTED PROGRAMS BEING INSTALLED!
reviews.author: David Fried

reviews.title: Make it work offline
reviews.comment: This app would be great only if it works offline  Otherwise 5 stars
reviews.author: Karan Mishra

reviews.title: Not good...poor
reviews.comment: Keeps shutting my phone down uninstall
reviews.author: Marie B

reviews.title: Ridiculous ads for unreliable product
reviews.comment: If the app hadn\'t been crashing my phone these past weeks, then I\'d at least debate accepting the overly intrusive ad strategy. Being what it is, though, it\'s just laughable to think anyone would be willing to put up with that. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Jamie Clark

reviews.title: Ad heav, loads unwanted search app.
reviews.comment: They load an unwanted search app on your desktop. The app comes with lots of ads that you have to navigate through.

reviews.comment: Its intertaining and its fun
